title: Abous my leavebusted
body:
My laptop have 8 GB RAM and video card NVIDIA have 2 GB,I don know my my lol FPS 01-10 only
Than ban me 5 time stupid 
who can help me~~~~~~~~~ ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh
sad life

replies.body:
That sounds pretty crappy, especially if your FPS is dropping low enough to cause you a leave.  I'm curious, though if these frame drops are actually a result of lag if it's kicking you from game.  When you get a chance, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can see if there are any issues with your network.

You can also run through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your FPS settings and drivers are in good shape.  Let me know!
